faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Can't find an answer to your question? Feel free to just reach out.
faq.q1: What is SyncBeds and how does it help property owners?
faq.a1: SyncBeds is an all-in-one property management solution that helps rental property owners manage their bookings. The platform includes a channel manager, eVisitor integration, a direct booking website, smart apartment features, and more.
faq.q2: How does the Channel Manager prevent double bookings?
faq.a2: The channel manager synchronizes your calendar across all platforms in real-time, ensuring that when a booking is made on one platform, the availability is instantly updated on all others.
faq.q3: Is SyncBeds eVisitor integration compliant with Croatian regulations?
faq.a3: Yes, SyncBeds eVisitor integration is fully compliant with Croatian guest registration regulations, automating the entire check-in process.
faq.q4: Can I accept direct bookings through my website?
faq.a4: Absolutely! SyncBeds provides you with a customizable booking website that allows guests to book directly with you, avoiding third-party commission fees.
faq.q5: How do smart apartment features improve my rental business?
faq.a5: Smart apartment features like keyless entry, automated climate control, and energy management help reduce operational costs while improving guest experience.
faq.q6: What level of support does SyncBeds provide?
faq.a6: SyncBeds provides comprehensive support including free training, technical support during business hours, and dedicated account managers for enterprise clients.
